Package com.holidaysystem.repository

Interface IEmployeeRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmployeeRepository
    public interface IEmployeeRepository
    Interface for Employee repository, which can be supported by all implementations of the interface
    Author:
    yauhen bichel yb3129h@gre.ac.uk Student Id 001185491
